alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Pocahontas; Sac (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 13 at 4:31PM CDT until May 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Pocahontas County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Sac County in west central Iowa... Northwestern Calhoun County in west central Iowa... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 5 miles southwest of Fonda, or 7 miles northeast of Sac City, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Varina. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
